description: Path to the input Excel data file
Sheet name in the Excel file
Filter rules separated by semicolon (;). Operators: ==, !=, >, <, >=, <=, %in%. Example: Group %in% A,B
Whether to use inverse probability weights (IPW)
Column name for weights (only used if use_weight=TRUE)
Starting column index (1-based) for T0 variables
Ending column index for T0 variables
Starting column index for T1 variables
Ending column index for T1 variables
Covariate column names, separated by commas (set to NA if none)
Short names for nodes (must match number of variables)
Full descriptive names for each node

value: Domain A,Domain A,Domain A,Domain B,Domain B,Domain B,Domain B,Domain C,Domain C,Domain C

description: Number of CPU cores for parallel processing
